author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lovisa Holdings Says HY ‍Profit After Tax Attributable $24.8​ Mln
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Lovisa Holdings Ltd:
* ‍HY REVENUE INCREASED BY 18.9% TO $118.6 MILLION​ * ‍FULLY FRANKED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 13.0 CENTS PER SHARE * HY ‍PROFIT AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE INCREASE 22.5% TO $24.8​ MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
